channel.title: Voule
channel.description: Anybody got a working voule? Mine doesnt close original .bat ;D

item.title: Voule
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:398187”]Then it’s not an “auto-restarter”. All it does is compile the server, and then run it.

That’s why you’re getting the “Address is already bound” error. There’s already a server listening to the port (first server running), and when you try to run the second server, the first one is still listening, so it stops.

The only thing I can suggest is keep search for the actual restarter program. Other than that, I’d say clean up the server,a and make it more dynamic so you don’t have to stop and start it.[/quote]
I’m asking for a code for it. I know whats wrong with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Voule
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Then it’s not an “auto-restarter”. All it does is compile the server, and then run it.

That’s why you’re getting the “Address is already bound” error. There’s already a server listening to the port (first server running), and when you try to run the second server, the first one is still listening, so it stops.

The only thing I can suggest is keep search for the actual restarter program. Other than that, I’d say clean up the server,a and make it more dynamic so you don’t have to stop and start it.

Read full topic

item.title: Voule
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:398187”][quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=495321.msg3621292#msg3621292 date=1307431424]

Probably by adding “end” or “exit” at the end of the batch file. Can’t remember which one it is.

This came with source so idk whats wrong with it

@echo off echo Voule Auto restart title PK Jad Scape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
[/quote]

That’s the batch file to run the server.[/quote]
This is my run

@echo off title PkJad Scape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

This is my voule

@echo off echo Voule Auto restart title PK Jad Scape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server end

Read full topic

Anybody got a working voule? Mine doesnt close original .bat ;D
